mapper.insert: insert into user (id, username, phone, password, role, sex, job_search_status, birthday, identity, email, birthplace, img) values (#{id}, #{username}, #{phone}, #{password}, #{role}, #{sex}, #{jobSearchStatus}, #{birthday}, #{identity}, #{email}, #{birthplace}, #{img})
mapper.update: update user set username = #{username}, phone = #{phone}, password = #{password}, sex = #{sex}, job_search_status = #{jobSearchStatus}, birthday = #{birthday}, birthplace = #{birthplace}, identity = #{identity}, email = #{email}, img = #{img} where id = #{id}
